text:
[Verse]
Morning light it whispers
Wake up from your dreams
Birds sing outside windows
Start of new day gleams

[Verse 2]
Coffee brews it warms us
Toast in golden shades
A new day is waiting
In its bright cascade

[Chorus]
Hey hey morning sunshine
Light up sky anew
Hey hey feel the warmth now
Guiding me and you

[Verse 3]
Steps on paths of promise
Everywhere we go
Morning brings new chances
We let the light flow

[Verse 4]
Clouds they may come drifting
Still the sun breaks through
Smiles in every corner
Sharing morning view

[Bridge]
Hope and dreams awaken
In this soft dawn hue
Life begins each morning
Every day brand new
title: Morning Sunshine
